name: Stench
description: Releases a stench that may cause an attacked foe to flinch.

name: Drizzle
description: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

name: Speed Boost
description: The Pokémon's Speed stat is boosted every turn.

name: Battle Armor
description: Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

name: Sturdy
description: The Pokémon can't be knocked out in one hit or by one-hit KO moves.

name: Damp
description: Prevents self-destruction by dampening its surroundings.

name: Limber
description: The Pokémon's limber body prevents it from being paralyzed.

name: Sand Veil
description: Reduces physical damage taken in a sandstorm.

name: Static
description: The Pokémon is statically-charged. Contact with it may cause paralysis.

name: Volt Absorb
description: Restores HP if hit by Electric-type moves instead of taking damage.

name: Water Absorb
description: Restores HP if hit by Water-type moves instead of taking damage.

name: Oblivious
description: Keeps the Pokémon from being infatuated, taunted, or intimidated.

name: Cloud Nine
description: Eliminates the effects of weather.

name: Compound Eyes
description: The Pokémon's compound eyes boost its accuracy.

name: Insomnia
description: The Pokémon's insomnia prevents it from falling asleep.

name: Color Change
description: The Pokémon's type becomes the type of the move used on it.

name: Immunity
description: The Pokémon's immune system prevents it from being poisoned.

name: Flash Fire
description: Absorbs Fire-type moves to power up the Pokémon's own Fire-type moves.

name: Shield Dust
description: Protective dust shields the Pokémon from additional move effects.

name: Own Tempo
description: This Pokémon has its own tempo, and cannot be confused or intimidated.

name: Suction Cups
description: The Pokémon is firmly anchored. It cannot be forcibly switched out.

name: Intimidate
description: The Pokémon lowers the foe's Attack stat upon entering battle.

name: Shadow Tag
description: The Pokémon steps on the foe's shadow to prevent it from escaping.

name: Rough Skin
description: The Pokémon's rough skin damages foes making direct contact with it.

name: Wonder Guard
description: The Pokémon's mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit it.

name: Levitate
description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon is immune to all Ground-type moves.

name: Effect Spore
description: Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis.

name: Synchronize
description: Passes poison, paralysis, or burn to the Pokémon that inflicted it.

name: Clear Body
description: Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering its stats.

name: Natural Cure
description: The Pokémon's status conditions are cured when it switches out.

name: Lightning Rod
description: Draws in Electric-type moves to boost Sp. Atk without getting hit.

name: Serene Grace
description: Boosts the likelihood of additional effects occurring when attacking.

name: Swift Swim
description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in rain.

name: Chlorophyll
description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.

name: Illuminate
description: Illuminates its surroundings. Its acccuracy is increased.

name: Trace
description: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies a foe Pokémon's ability.

name: Huge Power
description: Doubles the Pokémon's Attack stat.

name: Poison Point
description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

name: Inner Focus
description: The Pokémon is intensely focused and cannot be flinched or intimidated.

name: Magma Armor
description: The Pokémon's hot magma coating prevents it from being frozen.

name: Water Veil
description: The Pokémon's water veil prevents it from being burned.

name: Magnet Pull
description: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from fleeing with its magenetic force.

name: Soundproof
description: Soundproofing gives the Pokémon immunity to all sound-based moves.

name: Rain Dish
description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

name: Sand Stream
description: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.

name: Pressure
description: Puts other Pokémon under pressure. They will expend more PP to attack.

name: Thick Fat
description: A layer of fat halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

name: Early Bird
description: The Pokémon awakens from sleep twice as fast as other Pokémon.

name: Flame Body
description: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

name: Run Away
description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

name: Keen Eye
description: The Pokémon's keen eyes prevent its accuracy from being lowered.

name: Hyper Cutter
description: The Pokémon's mighty pincers prevent others from lowering its Attack.

name: Pickup
description: The Pokémon may pick up an item both in an out of battle.

name: Truant
description: Each time the Pokémon uses a move, it loafs around the next turn.

name: Hustle
description: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but lowers its accuracy.

name: Cute Charm
description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

name: Plus
description: Boosts the Pokémon's Sp. Atk stat if an active ally has Plus or Minus.

name: Minus
description: Boosts the Pokémon's Sp. Atk stat if an active ally has Plus or Minus.

name: Forecast
description: Changes the Pokémon's type to Water, Fire, or Ice dependent on weather.

name: Sticky Hold
description: The Pokémon's held items are stuck fast and cannot be forcibly removed.

name: Shed Skin
description: The Pokémon may cure its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

name: Guts
description: It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts its Attack stat.

name: Marvel Scale
description: Its scales boost its Defense stat if it has a status condition.

name: Liquid Ooze
description: The Pokémon's oozed liquid damages attackers that drain its HP.

name: Overgrow
description: Powers ups Grass-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

name: Blaze
description: Powers ups Fire-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

name: Torrent
description: Powers ups Water-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

name: Swarm
description: Powers ups Bug-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

name: Rock Head
description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

name: Drought
description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters battle.

name: Arena Trap
description: Prevents the opposing Pokémon from fleeing battle.

name: Vital Spirit
description: The Pokémon's incredible vitality prevents it from falling asleep.

name: White Smoke
description: Its protective white smoke prevents others from lowering its stats.

name: Pure Power
description: Using its pure power, the Pokémon doubles its Attack stat.

name: Shell Armor
description: A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

name: Air Lock
description: Eliminates the effects of weather.

name: Tangled Feet
description: Reduces damage taken if confused.

name: Motor Drive
description: Incoming Electric-type moves do no damage and boost Speed instead.

name: Rivalry
description: It does more damage to the same gender but less to the opposite.

name: Steadfast
description: The Pokémon's determination boosts its Speed stat when it flinches.

name: Snow Cloak
description: Reduces special damage taken in snow.

name: Gluttony
description: The Pokémon will eat its held Berry at half HP instead of at quarter HP.

name: Anger Point
description: The Pokémon is angered when hit critically, maxing its Attack stat.

name: Unburden
description: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon's held item is used or lost.

name: Heatproof
description: With its heatproof body, it halves damage taken from Fire-type moves.

name: Simple
description: Doubles the effects of the Pokémon's stat changes.

name: Dry Skin
description: Water and rain restore its HP, but it's damaged by sun and Fire.

name: Download
description: The Pokémon analyzes a foe to raise its most-effective attacking stat.

name: Iron Fist
description: Powers up punching moves.

name: Poison Heal
description: If poisoned, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

name: Adaptability
description: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.

name: Skill Link
description: Maximizes the number of times a multistrike move hits.

name: Hydration
description: Cures the Pokémon's status conditions in rain.

name: Solar Power
description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in sunlight, but HP is decreased every turn.

name: Quick Feet
description: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.

name: Normalize
description: All its moves become Normal-type and their power is boosted.

name: Sniper
description: If the Pokémon lands a critical hit, the attack is powered up further.

name: Magic Guard
description: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

name: No Guard
description: The Pokémon ensures incoming and outgoing attacks never miss.

name: Stall
description: The Pokémon is always the last to use its moves.

name: Technician
description: Powers up weak moves so the Pokémon can deal more damage with them.

name: Leaf Guard
description: Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.

name: Klutz
description: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

name: Mold Breaker
description: The Pokémon's moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

name: Super Luck
description: The Pokémon is so lucky that its moves critically hit more often.

name: Aftermath
description: Damages the attacker that knocks it out with a direct contact move.

name: Anticipation
description: The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon's dangerous moves.

name: Forewarn
description: The Pokémon can tell one of its foe's moves when entering battle.

name: Unaware
description: When attacking, the Pokémon ignores the target's stat changes.

name: Tinted Lens
description: The Pokémon's “not very effective” moves deal regular damage.

name: Filter
description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks that hit the Pokémon.

name: Slow Start
description: For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.

name: Scrappy
description: Hits Ghost types with Fighting- and Normal-type moves. Not intimidated.

name: Storm Drain
description: Draws in Water-type moves to boost Sp. Atk without getting hit.

name: Ice Body
description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in snow.

name: Solid Rock
description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks that hit the Pokémon.

name: Snow Warning
description: The Pokémon makes it snow when it enters a battle.

name: Honey Gather
description: The Pokémon may gather Honey after a battle.

name: Frisk
description: When it enters battle, the Pokémon checks a foe's held item.

name: Reckless
description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

name: Multitype
description: Changes the Pokémon's type to match the plate it holds.

name: Flower Gift
description: Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats of itself and allies in sunlight.

name: Bad Dreams
description: Damages opposing Pokémon that are asleep.

name: Pickpocket
description: The Pokémon steals an attacker's held item when they make contact.

name: Sheer Force
description: Additional move effects don't occur, but the moves' power is boosted.

name: Contrary
description: Inverts stat changes. Boosting stats lowers them instead, and vice versa.

name: Unnerve
description: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.

name: Defiant
description: Sharply boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat if a foe lowers its stats.

name: Defeatist
description: Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when HP is half or less.

name: Cursed Body
description: May disable a move that has dealt damage to the Pokémon.

name: Healer
description: Sometimes cures the status conditions of the Pokémon's allies.

name: Friend Guard
description: Reduces damage dealt to allies.

name: Weak Armor
description: When physically hit, its Defense stat falls and Speed is sharply boosted.

name: Heavy Metal
description: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

name: Light Metal
description: Halves the Pokémon's weight.

name: Multiscale
description: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.

name: Toxic Boost
description: Powers up physical moves when the Pokémon is poisoned.

name: Flare Boost
description: Powers up special moves when the Pokémon is burned.

name: Harvest
description: May create another Berry after one is used.

name: Telepathy
description: The Pokémon anticipates and dodges the attacks of its allies.

name: Moody
description: Every turn, one stat will be sharply boosted and another lowered.

name: Overcoat
description: The Pokémon is protected from sandstorms, powders, and spores.

name: Poison Touch
description: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.

name: Regenerator
description: The Pokémon has a little of its HP restored when withdrawn from battle.

name: Big Pecks
description: Prevents the Pokémon from having its Defense stat lowered.

name: Sand Rush
description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a sandstorm.

name: Wonder Skin
description: Prevents status conditions.

name: Analytic
description: Boosts the power of the Pokémon's move if it acts last that turn.

name: Illusion
description: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in the party's last spot.

name: Imposter
description: The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it's facing.

name: Infiltrator
description: The Pokémon's moves penetrate the target's barriers, substitutes, etc.

name: Mummy
description: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker's Ability to Mummy.

name: Moxie
description: Knocking out a Pokémon shows moxie, and that boosts its Attack stat.

name: Justified
description: When hit by a Dark-type move, its Attack stat is boosted for justice.

name: Rattled
description: Ups Speed when intimidated or hit by Bug-, Ghost-, or Dark-type moves.

name: Magic Bounce
description: The Pokémon reflects status moves instead of getting hit by them.

name: Sap Sipper
description: Incoming Grass-type moves do no damage and boost Attack instead.

name: Prankster
description: Gives priority to the Pokémon's status moves.

name: Sand Force
description: Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.

name: Iron Barbs
description: The Pokémon's iron barbs damage foes making direct contact with it.

name: Zen Mode
description: Changes the Pokémon's shape when its HP drops to half or less.

name: Victory Star
description: Boosts the accuracy of the Pokémon and its allies.

name: Turboblaze
description: The Pokémon's moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

name: Teravolt
description: The Pokémon's moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

name: Aroma Veil
description: Protects the Pokémon and its allies from effects that prevent move use.

name: Flower Veil
description: Ally Grass types are protected from status conditions and stat lowering.

name: Cheek Pouch
description: Eating a Berry restores HP in addition to its usual effect.

name: Protean
description: Changes its type to that of a queued move once per battle entrance.

name: Fur Coat
description: Halves the damage from physical moves.

name: Magician
description: The Pokémon steals the held item from any target it hits with a move.

name: Bulletproof
description: Protects the Pokémon from ball and bomb moves.

name: Competitive
description: Sharply boosts the Pokémon's Sp. Atk stat if a foe lowers its stats.

name: Strong Jaw
description: The Pokémon's strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.

name: Refrigerate
description: Normal-type moves become Ice-type and their power is boosted.

name: Sweet Veil
description: Prevents the Pokémon and its allies from falling asleep.

name: Stance Change
description: Changes to Blade Forme by attacking, and Shield Forme with King's Shield.

name: Gale Wings
description: Gives priority to Flying-type moves while its HP is full.

name: Mega Launcher
description: Powers up pulse moves.

name: Grass Pelt
description: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat on Grassy Terrain.

name: Symbiosis
description: The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.

name: Tough Claws
description: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

name: Pixilate
description: Normal-type moves become Fairy- type and their power is boosted.

name: Gooey
description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

name: Aerilate
description: Normal-type moves become Flying- type and their power is boosted.

name: Parental Bond
description: The parent and child attack one after the other.

name: Dark Aura
description: Powers up the Dark-type moves of all Pokémon on the field.

name: Fairy Aura
description: Powers up the Fairy-type moves of all Pokémon on the field.

name: Aura Break
description: The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed, weakening affected moves.

name: Primordial Sea
description: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Fire-type attacks.

name: Desolate Land
description: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Water-type attacks.

name: Delta Stream
description: The Pokémon changes the weather so Flying-types have no weaknesses.

name: Stamina
description: Boosts the Defense stat when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.

name: Wimp Out
description: The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP drops to half or less.

name: Emergency Exit
description: It, sensing danger, switches out when its HP drops to half or less.

name: Water Compaction
description: Boosts the Defense stat sharply when hit by a Water-type move.

name: Merciless
description: The Pokémon's attacks hit critically if the target is poisoned.

name: Shields Down
description: At half HP or less, its shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.

name: Stakeout
description: Doubles the damage dealt to a target that has just switched into battle.

name: Water Bubble
description: Halves Fire damage, prevents burns, and doubles Water-type move power.

name: Steelworker
description: Powers up Steel-type moves.

name: Berserk
description: Boosts its Sp. Atk stat when a hit drops its HP to half or less.

name: Slush Rush
description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in snow.

name: Long Reach
description: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

name: Liquid Voice
description: Sound-based moves become Water-type moves.

name: Triage
description: Gives priority to the Pokémon's healing moves.

name: Galvanize
description: Normal-type moves become Electric- type and their power is boosted.

name: Surge Surfer
description: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed stat on Electric Terrain.

name: Schooling
description: With high HP, forms a mighty school. It stops schooling with low HP.

name: Disguise
description: Once per battle, the shroud covering it can protect it from an attack.

name: Battle Bond
description: When it KOs a target, its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats are boosted.

name: Power Construct
description: When its HP drops to half or less, cells change it into Complete Forme.

name: Corrosion
description: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it's a Steel or Poison type.

name: Comatose
description: The Pokémon is always drowsing. It can still attack without ever waking.

name: Queenly Majesty
description: The Pokémon's majesty makes foes unable to hit with priority moves.

name: Innards Out
description: When knocked out, does damage equal to its remaining HP to the attacker.

name: Dancer
description: When another Pokémon dances, it will copy the move and use it next.

name: Battery
description: Powers up ally Pokémon's special moves.

name: Fluffy
description: Halves the damage taken from contact moves, but doubles Fire-type damage.

name: Dazzling
description: The Pokémon dazzles its foes so they can't hit with priority moves.

name: Soul?Heart
description: Boosts the Pokémon's Sp. Atk stat every time another Pokémon faints.

name: Tangling Hair
description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

name: Receiver
description: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

name: Power Of Alchemy
description: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

name: Beast Boost
description: Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat every time it KOs a target.

name: RKS System
description: Changes the Pokémon's type to match the memory disc it holds.

name: Electric Surge
description: Turns the field into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters battle.

name: Psychic Surge
description: Turns the field into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters battle.

name: Misty Surge
description: Turns the field into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters battle.

name: Grassy Surge
description: Turns the field into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters battle.

name: Full Metal Body
description: Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering its stats.

name: Shadow Shield
description: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.

name: Prism Armor
description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks that hit the Pokémon.

name: Neuroforce
description: Powers up the Pokémon's supereffective moves even further.

name: Intrepid Sword
description: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat the first time it enters battle.

name: Dauntless Shield
description: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat the first time it enters battle.

name: Libero
description: Changes its type to that of a queued move once per battle entrance.

name: Ball Fetch
description: It will fetch a failed Poké Ball if it is not already holding an item.

name: Cotton Down
description: Cotton fluff is scattered when hit, lowering all others' Speed stats.

name: Propeller Tail
description: Ignores redirection effects from the foe's Abilities and moves.

name: Mirror Armor
description: Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokémon receives.

name: Gulp Missile
description: Finds prey with Surf or Dive. When hit, it spits the prey out at the foe.

name: Stalwart
description: Ignores redirection effects from the foe's Abilities and moves.

name: Steam Engine
description: Drastically boosts Speed if it's hit by Fire- or Water-type moves.

name: Punk Rock
description: Boosts the power of and takes half damage from sound-based moves.

name: Sand Spit
description: The Pokémon creates a sandstorm if it's hit by an attack.

name: Ice Scales
description: The Pokémon's ice scales halve damage taken from special moves.

name: Ripen
description: Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.

name: Ice Face
description: Its ice head acts as a substitute. The ice is restored when it snows.

name: Power Spot
description: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.

name: Mimicry
description: Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.

name: Screen Cleaner
description: When it enters battle, Light Screen Reflect, and Aurora Veil all end.

name: Steely Spirit
description: Powers up the Steel-type moves of the Pokémon and its allies.

name: Perish Body
description: If the foe makes direct contact, it and the foe will faint in three turns.

name: Wandering Spirit
description: The Pokémon trades Abilities with a foe that makes direct contact.

name: Gorilla Tactics
description: Boosts its Attack stat but only the first move selected is usable.

name: Neutralizing Gas
description: While the Pokémon is in battle, all other Abilities are nullified.

name: Pastel Veil
description: Prevents the Pokémon and its allies from being poisoned.

name: Hunger Switch
description: It oscillates between its Full Belly and Hangry Modes each turn.

name: Quick Draw
description: Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.

name: Unseen Fist
description: The Pokémon's direct contact moves bypass the foe's protection effects.

name: Curious Medicine
description: When the Pokémon enters battle, all allies' stat changes are removed.

name: Transistor
description: Powers up Electric-type moves.

name: Dragon's Maw
description: Powers up Dragon-type moves.

name: Chilling Neigh
description: Utters a chilling neigh when KOing a foe, boosting its Attack stat.

name: Grim Neigh
description: Utters a terrifying neigh when KOing a foe, boosting its Sp. Atk stat.

name: As One
description: KOing a foe boosts its Attack stat. The foe cannot eat Berries.

name: As One
description: KOing a foe boosts its Sp. Atk stat. The foe cannot eat Berries.

name: Lingering Aroma
description: The attacker's Ability changes to Lingering Aroma when making contact.

name: Seed Sower
description: When hit by an attack, turns the field into Grassy Terrain.

name: Thermal Exchange
description: Boosts its Attack when hit by Fire- type moves. It cannot be burned.

name: Anger Shell
description: At half HP or less, its defenses fall while offenses and Speed rise.

name: Purifying Salt
description: It's immune to status conditions. Ghost-type moves do half damage.

name: Well?Baked Body
description: Incoming Fire-type moves do no damage and sharply boost Defense.

name: Wind Rider
description: Incoming wind moves do no damage and boost its Attack stat instead.

name: Guard Dog
description: If intimidated, its Attack stat is boosted. Cannot be forced to flee.

name: Rocky Payload
description: Powers up Rock-type moves.

name: Wind Power
description: Being hit by a wind move charges its next Electric-type move.

name: Zero to Hero
description: The Pokémon transforms into its Hero Form when it switches out.

name: Commander
description: When it enters battle, it goes into an ally Dondozo's mouth to command it.

name: Electromorphosis
description: Taking damage charges it, boosting its next Electric-type move.

name: Protosynthesis
description: Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat in sun or with a Booster Energy.

name: Quark Drive
description: Boosts its best stat on Electric Terrain or with a Booster Energy.

name: Good as Gold
description: A body of pure gold grants immunity to other Pokémon's status moves.

name: Vessel of Ruin
description: Lowers all other Pokémon's Sp. Atk stats with its ruinous vessel.

name: Sword of Ruin
description: Lowers all other Pokémon's Defense stats with its ruinous sword.

name: Tablets of Ruin
description: Lowers all other Pokémon's Attack stats with its ruinous tablets.

name: Beads of Ruin
description: Lowers all other Pokémon's Sp. Def stats with its ruinous beads.

name: Orichalcum Pulse
description: Summons harsh sunlight when entering battle. Sunlight raises its Attack.

name: Hadron Engine
description: Sets Electric Terrain when entering battle. That terrain ups its Sp. Atk.

name: Opportunist
description: If a foe's stat is boosted, it boosts the same stat for itself.

name: Cud Chew
description: An eaten Berry will be regurgitated and eaten once more on the next turn.

name: Sharpness
description: Powers up slicing moves.

name: Supreme Overlord
description: Each fainted party member slightly boosts the Pokémon's offensive stats.

name: Costar
description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it copies an ally's stat changes.

name: Toxic Debris
description: When hit by a physical move, lays Toxic Spikes at the feet of the foe.

name: Armor Tail
description: The Pokémon's odd tail makes foes unable to hit with priority moves.

name: Earth Eater
description: Restores HP if hit by Ground-type moves instead of taking damage.

name: Mycelium Might
description: The Pokémon's status moves are slow, but can't be blocked by Abilities.

name: Hospitality
description: Restores a quarter of an ally's HP when the Pokémon enters battle.

name: Mind's Eye
description: Its accuracy can't drop. Ignores evasiveness and Ghost immunities.

name: Embody Aspect
description: Its Teal Mask shines, boosting the Pokémon's Speed stat.

name: Embody Aspect
description: Its Hearthflame Mask shines, boosting the Pokémon's Attack stat.

name: Embody Aspect
description: Its Wellspring Mask shines, boosting the Pokémon's Sp. Def stat.

name: Embody Aspect
description: Its Cornerstone Mask shines, boosting the Pokémon's Defense stat.

name: Toxic Chain
description: The Pokémon's toxic chain may badly poison foes hit by its moves.

name: Supersweet Syrup
description: Once per battle, the Pokémon emits a scent that lowers evasiveness.

name: Tera Shift
description: When entering battle, it absorbs energy to assume its Terastal Form.

name: Tera Shell
description: When at full HP, all damage-dealing moves it's hit by are resisted.

name: Teraform Zero
description: When assuming its Stellar Form, it eliminates weather and terrain.

name: Poison Puppeteer
description: Pokémon poisoned by the Pokémon's moves will also become confused.

name: Cultivate
description: Powers ups Grass and Water moves when Pokémon's HP is low.

name: Luminous
description: Powers ups Fire and Grass moves when Pokémon's HP is low.

name: Pyroclast
description: Powers ups Water and Fire moves when Pokémon's HP is low.
